lead_paragraph: This video includes violent scenes and graphic language. It has been condensed from its original length but is otherwise unaltered. On Nov. 20, 2015, Chase Sherman was handcuffed and stunned with a Taser by two Coweta County, Ga., sheriff's deputies responding to a 911 call from his parents. He died at the scene. The body cameras worn by the deputies captured the episode.

byline.original: By A.J. CHAVAR and MICHAEL SCHMIDT

headline.main: Fatal Police Encounter Captured by Body Cameras
